slides.title: Blue Ribbon Sports

content.description: Nike started as Blue Ribbon Sports in 1964. Sales started out of their car trunks. A key milestone was landing a distribution deal was with Onitsuka Tiger (ASICS)

slides.title: Becoming Nike

content.description: The swoosh and the NIKE brand was born in 1971. It was purchase for $35 from Carolyn Davidson and symbolizes speed, movement, and athleticism.

slides.title: Off to the Races
slides.content: The 80s were an era of rapid growth with an IPO in 1980 that accelerated off the successful launch in 1979 of Nike Air cushioning.

slides.title: Recap: the evolution of Nike
content: 80s: Become a household name with IPO and Jordan becoming a star
90s: Become the shoe of choice across a vast number of sports
00s: Becomes a global phenomenon with global sales and a big foothold in digital shoe sales.
Now: Nike continues to grow with intensity in emerging markets like India and Africa
